key_points: Colin Powell, former Secretary of State and four-star general, died in October.
Donald Rumsfeld, former Defense Secretary, died in June.
Both Powell's and Rumsfeld's legacies were impacted by the war in Iraq.
Other political figures who died include Walter F. Mondale, F.W. de Klerk, and Rush Limbaugh.
Hank Aaron, a baseball legend known for breaking Babe Ruth's record, died in January.
Sports figures such as Tommy Lasorda and Bobby Bowden also passed away in 2021.
Children's author Beverly Cleary died in March, known for creating characters like Ramona Quimby.
Entertainers who died include Cicely Tyson, Ed Asner, and Christopher Plummer.
Musicians like Charlie Watts, DMX, and Biz Markie were among the notable deaths.
The world of arts lost figures such as Stephen Sondheim, Carla Fracci, and Richard Donner in 2021.
